not_found.title: Page Not Found
not_found.text: Wrong address or this page does not exist

forbidden.title: Access error
forbidden.text: The page may not be available or you may not have permission to open it.

errors.max256: Title should be less than 256 characters
errors.getError: Could not retrieve data from server
errors.video: Sorry, your browser does not support embedded video.
errors.passwordPattern: Password must be at least 8 characters and contain at least one number and one uppercase letter
errors.emailAlreadyExist: An account with this email address already exists
errors.toManyRequests: Too many requests, try again later
errors.finishBeforeStart: The end date cannot be earlier than the start date
errors.dateBeforeNow: You cannot select a date earlier than the current date
errors.notFoundPage: The page was not found or you do not have enough permissions to view it
